page.title: 15ASHDALE FARM
page.content: feeding out of buckets.There were 3 calves in the house_2 were 1 week old and the other one was 1 month old.The hay shed was nearly empty.There were some bales of hay and straw on either side.The milking parlour can take 8 cows at a time.A cow would give an average of 5 litres a day.A very poor milker would give 3 litres per day.A very good milker would give 8-9 litres per day.After that we went to the silage pit.It was empty,ready for next week's silage. Mr.Wallace had been cleaning out a calfhouse for the young calves.It held about 20 calves.His future plans are to keep on increasing his herd. By Derek Coulter
